title: [BUG] Simple encoding (i.e jpeg to png) is 3-4 times slower than Microsoft's System.Drawing on Windows
body:
### Description

Hi!

Microsoft recommends moving on to SkiaSharp.
I've tested some code, but no matter what I encode and how, it always comes out at least 3-4 times slower than Gdi.
Is there something I missing? Gdi using GPU and Skia not?
Any known workarounds?

Thank you

### Code


```cs
using var skImage = SKImage.FromBitmap(SKBitmap.Decode("D:\\Downloads\\test.jpg"));
using var stream = File.Create("D:\\Downloads\\test.png");
imageData.Encode(SKEncodedImageFormat.Png, 100).SaveTo(stream);
```


### Expected Behavior

Somewhat comparable performance, if not better

### Actual Behavior

Worse, so much worse

### Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.3 (Current)
